physical_appearance: "The image shows two strips of palm leaf and a stamped envelope. All of them are light brown in colour. There is a thread running through the circular holes located on the left hand side of each strip of palm leaf. There are Tamil scripts written, in straight horizontal lines from left to right, as well as in several handwritten boxes. ""Pno. No 16440"" and ""S.T.S. Rm. Ramasamy Chettiar"" are written in black ink at theleft hand side of the palm leaves. ""Empire of India
